com.compendium.ui.popups
Class UINodePopupMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  com.compendium.ui.popups.UINodePopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class UINodePopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class draws and handles events for the right-cick menu for nodes in a map

See Also:
Serialized Form

type, - the type to change the selected nodes to.

onChangeTypeToList(com.compendium.ui.UINode), onChangeTypeToMap(com.compendium.ui.UINode)
